title: Right Tool For The Job
blockb: B: Spend 4 Ore. Keel has +1 Survival for the remainder of the season. End of season: Burn card and unlock Keel 2.

title: Alone in the Dark
blockb: B: Play when Keel is alone at an Imperial location. Keel has +1 Thievery for the remainder of the season. End of season: Burn card and unlock Keel 3.

title: Unlikely Friends
blockb: B: Play when Menas is at the same location. Remove one psyche condition on Keel. Burn card and unlock Keel 4.

title: Misdirection
blockb: B: Move an obstacle to any unoccupied urban location in same mission area.

title: The Direct Approach
blockb: B: +4 Fortune and every other character in party is Angry. Burn card and unlock Menas 2.

title: Whispering Spirits
blockb: B: Play when Oniri is at the same location. Menas is Shaken. Burn card and unlock Menas 3.

title: Less Talk!
blockb: B: Play when Thea is at the same location. Menas is Angry. Burn card and unlock Menas 4.

title: Black and White
blockb: B Interrupt: Spend 4 Luxury. Success: Remove Frustrated or Angry condition on another character at same location. Burn card and unlock Thea 2.

title: The Conciliator
blockb: B Interrupt: Thea is Exhausted. Remove one psyche condition on another character at same location. Burn card and unlock Thea 3.

title: Diplomatic Insights
blockb: B Interrupt: Play when Thea is on an Alliance mission. Examine top 4 cards in progress deck. Arrange as desired. Burn card and unlock Thea 4.

title: A Call to Action
blocka: Increase the disposition of a faction by one.

title: Market Manipulations
blockb: B: Play when Thea is at the same location. Thea is Shaken. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 2.

title: Bending Rules
blockb: B: Play when Fuscus is at an Imperial location. Remove one timer progress from Mission Overview card. Shuffle progress deck. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 3.

title: Very Charming
blockb: B: Spend 5 Luxury. Fuscus has +1 Rapport for the remainder of the season. Burn card and unlock Fuscus 4.

title: I'm Always in Pain
blockb: B: Spend 4 Mana. Give Oniri a condition to remove a condition from someone else in the party. Burn card and unlock Oniri 2.

title: Always Alone
blockb: B: Play when Oniri is alone at a Quest location. Oniri is Exhausted. Burn card and unlock Oniri 3.

title: Necromantic Mana Well
blockb: B: Oniri is Shattered. Increase mana track. Burn card and unlock Oniri 4.
